data.text: @chrisbolay @HousingIsKey what’s happening on april 1 with rent relief?
@L1Quincy @HousingIsKey did they pay 6 months of back rent for you through march 2022?

@HousingIsKey My application got approved for the past 6 months, then you told me no more assistance from after March, It is totally not fair, you said 18 months, why you just stopped? I still have 10+ months to apply!
@HousingIsKey 4 months waiting on a reply. I honestly don’t need to talk to a case manager unless it is extremely necessary. All my info is there and I sent all documents when I applied.

@HousingIsKey Unfortunately, no one answers the phone. They said it’s 60+ minutes on hold to actually talk to a human being, and it probably won’t matter anyway, because no one will actually answer at all.
@HousingIsKey So as of April 1, the governor is just going to let tens of thousands of people go homeless after two years of promises?
@HousingIsKey I was in “QC Review” but then reverted to “Application Under Review.” What does this mean?
@HousingIsKey Been trying to speak with someone for over a week. Will keep trying.
@HousingIsKey In the next couple of years maybe
